{{ person.firstName }} {{ person.surname }} {{ person.dateOfBirth | date:'MM/dd/yyyy' }} {{ person.address }} {{ person.phone }} {{ person.iban }}
import { Component, Inject } from '@angular/core'; import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; @Component({ selector: 'app-get-people', templateUrl: './get-people.component.html' }) export class PeopleComponent { public people: Person[] = []; public person: any; ModalTitle = ""; ActivateAddEditPersonComp: boolean = false; constructor(private http: HttpClient, @Inject('BASE_URL') private baseUrl: string) { } public async ngOnInit(): Promise { this.http.get(this.baseUrl + 'people').subscribe(result => { this.people = result; }, error => console.error(error)); } addUser() { this.person = { PersonId: "0", //FirstName: "" } this.ModalTitle = "Add New Person"; this.ActivateAddEditPersonComp = true; } edutUser() { //TODO } deleteUser() { //TODO } closeClick() { this.ActivateAddEditPersonComp = false; } } export interface Person { personId: string; firstName: string; surname: string; dateOfBirth: Date; //Date address: string; phone: string; iban: string; }
